org.programus.nxj.util.txtimg
Class TextImage3x5

java.lang.Object
  org.programus.nxj.util.txtimg.TextImage
      org.programus.nxj.util.txtimg.TextImage3x5

public class TextImage3x5
extends TextImage

A 3x5 font implementation of TextImage.

Normally, we use this like below. 

 TextImage ti = new TextImage3x5(); 
 Image message = ti.getImage("MESSAGE"); 
 DisplayUtil.drawImageCenter(message, (LCD.SCREEN_HEIGHT >> 1), LCD.ROP_XOR);

Author:
Programus
See Also:
TextImage
